Header: UNP is open for different voices â€“ Minister KabirHashim
Content: Chairman of the United National Party, Minister KabirHashim states that the UNP always educates the people about the decisions to be taken on elections as it is a democratic body. Minister Hashim made these comments addressing the media at the UNP headquarters Sirikotha. He further stated that some media outlets propagate false information about internal conflicts of the UNP. The Minister noted that as the UNP is committed to protect democratic virtues, it is always open to different voices. He said that steps have been taken to start the election campaign and preliminary measures have already been taken. Hashim pointed out that future plans are being formulated under the supervision of the General Secretary of the Party.
